bibl.title: From Text to Text: The Impact of the Alexandrian Library on the Work of Hellenistic Poets.
bibl.note: Introduction. [Focuses on Callimachus and Apollonius Rhodius.] - Philology. - The literary traduction. - Myth, history and geography. - Conclusions.
bibl.seg: Annette Harder, From Text to Text: The Impact of the Alexandrian Library on the Work of Hellenistic Poets.
Jason König, Katerina Oikonomopoulou & Greg Woolf (edd.), Ancient Libraries (Cambridge, 2013) pp. 96-108.
Introduction. [Focuses on Callimachus and Apollonius Rhodius.] - Philology. - The literary traduction. - Myth, history and geography. - Conclusions.
